Title: Electing the team leader
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: A rural community meeting for the election of the team leader of the "No.1 Anti-Revisionism Team". The woman with the megaphone announces the results, also written on the blackboard: 47 people voted, 46 on candidate Wu Aishe (吴爱社) - everybody but Wu Aishe, probably. The woman with the white shirt, just left of center, is congratulated; she must be the winner.This poster is not signed, but another edition is credited to Guo Tongjiang.
